about_the_game:
Do you want to spice up the roster of your game with some unique and cool female characters? Those twelve beauties are ready to play any role in your story, from heroine to NPC to enemy, they can be whatever you want.

As all these come with not only a sprite, but also an SV and enemy battler graphic, busts, and faces with a full range of emotions, there is nothing you can’t do with them! Plus with the large extra artwork for each of them, you can even put together a title screen or custom menu!

Features:

* SV actors
* Faces
* Enemies
* and more!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
